tool_description: Identifies and screens potential comparable companies based on industry, size, business model, and other specified criteria for market-based valuation analysis.

target_company.description: Primary company for which comparables are needed

industry_codes.description: GICS, SIC, or NAICS industry classification codes

revenue_range_min.description: Minimum annual revenue in millions USD

revenue_range_max.description: Maximum annual revenue in millions USD

market_cap_range_min.description: Minimum market capitalization in millions USD

market_cap_range_max.description: Maximum market capitalization in millions USD

geographic_regions.description: Geographic regions to include in screening

exclude_companies.description: Company identifiers to exclude from results

business_model_similarity.description: Whether to filter by business model similarity

profitability_filter.description: Whether to include only profitable companies

max_results.description: Maximum number of comparable companies to return

error_messages: Invalid industry codes: Ensure industry codes are valid GICS, SIC, or NAICS classifications.
Insufficient screening criteria: Provide at least industry codes or size parameters to identify comparables.
No companies found: Adjust screening criteria as no companies match the specified parameters.
Invalid range parameters: Ensure minimum values are less than maximum values for revenue and market cap ranges.
usage: Specify target_company, industry_codes, and optionally filter by revenue ranges, market cap, geography, and other criteria. Returns a ranked list of comparable companies with similarity scores.

total_companies_found.description: Total number of companies matching criteria

comparable_companies.description: List of comparable company identifiers and basic info

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each comparable company (0-100)

screening_summary.description: Summary of screening criteria and results
